alert.note: Alert for Humboldt (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued November 01 at 5:46PM PDT until November 01 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southeastern Humboldt County in northwestern Nevada... * Until 615 PM PDT. * At 545 PM PDT, widespread dust remains over Winnemucca, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar and Nevada Department of Transportation webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. I-80 from 7 miles southwest of Winnemucca to mile marker 200 east of Golconda. Locations impacted include... Winnemucca, Golconda, Winnemucca Airport and Golconda Summit. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
